title: Wilderness: The Himalayas
creator_credit: Ned Kelly, British Broadcasting Corporation and Time-Life Films
brief_description: Narrator Anthony Smith journeys from India to Tibet along an ancient foot highway which unites the two countries. Highlights the fauna, flora and people en route. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
